DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To assess pharmacodynamic profile alirocumab ( SAR236553/REGN727 ) administer either alone top ezetimibe fenofibrate , base low-density lipoprotein -cholesterol ( LDL-C ) . Secondary Objectives : - To assess pharmacodynamic profile alirocumab administer either alone top ezetimibe fenofibrate , base lipid parameter . - To assess pharmacokinetic profile alirocumab administer either alone top ezetimibe fenofibrate .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Alirocumab ( SAR236553/REGN727 ) Administered Top Ezetimibe Fenofibrate Lipid Profiles Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Total duration study per subject ( exclude screen ) 22 week .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male /or female subject , age 18 65 year old , LDLC > 130 mg/dL receive lipid lower therapy . Exclusion criterion : Healthy subject history presence clinically relevant illness . Subjects currently take statin , ezetimibe fenofibrate . The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
